name: Ronali Padhy
bio: Ronali Padhy is currently working as Assistant Professor in school of computer engineering, KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar. She has completed her bachelor's degree from Parala maharaja engineering college, Berhampur in the year 2015. Then she joined masters in VSSUT, in Odisha. Her research area is cloud computing. She joined KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar in 2017.

tab_details.Research Interests: Cloud computing

publications: Ronali Padhy, Uttam Jena, Manas Ranjan Kabat, " Load balancing of tasks in cloud environment improved by dynamic genetic algorithm", ICTPACT-2017

name: Roshni Pradhan
bio: Roshni Pradhan is working as an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, where she has been since August, 2015 . Her research and publications deals with Cloud Computing and Data Mining. Her current research spans both scheduling heuristics in IaaS cloud and Application of Data Mining techniques in Cloud Environment. In addition to this, she is working on Application of Machine Learning Techniques. Her work has appeared in Advanced Research on Cloud Computing Design and Applications and International Journal of Information Processing. Beside this she has published many book chapters, journals and conference papers in the area of cloud computing. She has published two patents in the area of real life application of  Internet of Things (IoT).  She is a Fellow of the IET, ACM and Indian National Science Congress.

name: Sambit Praharaj
bio: Dr. Sambit Praharaj is currently working as a Senior Assistant Professor in KIIT since June 2024. His field of interests are Educational Technology, Artificial Intelligence in Education, NLP and Data Science. He completed his PostDoc in the field of Educational Technologies and Artificial Intelligence between June 2022 to May 2024 from Ruhr University Bochum and CAIS Germany. Prior to that he finished his PhD from the Open University of The Netherlands in March 2022 in the field of Educational Technology and AI and his Masters in Computer Science from Delft University of Technology, Netherlands in August 2017. Before that he did his Bachelors in Information Technology from VSSUT Burla, India.

tab_details.Research Interests: Educational Technology and AI, Artificial Intelligence in Education, NLP, Data Science

name: Sampriti Soor
bio: Sampriti Soor received the B.Tech. degree in Information Technology from West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata, and an M.E. degree in Software Engineering from Jadavpur University, Kolkata in 2011 and 2015 respectively. From 2012 to 2013, he worked as a System Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services. He joined the Systems Science and Informatics Unit at Indian Statistical Institute, Bangalore, as a Doctoral Fellow and he recieved PhD degree in Computer Science in 2022. His research interests are in the field of Mathematical Morphology, Image Processing, and Data Analysis.

tab_details.Research Interests: Image Processing, GIS,  Data Analysis

name: Sankalp Nayak
bio: Mr. Sankalp Nayak has completed his B.Tech. in computer science and engineering from KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar. He has worked as software developer at Lavelle networks. His area of interest is IoT and machine learning.

tab_details.Research Interests: Iot and machine learning

name: Santos Kumar Baliarsingh
bio: Santos Kumar Baliarsingh is working as an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar since 2019. Prof. Baliarsingh has completed his Ph.D. in Machine Learning from IIIT Bhubaneswar. He obtained his postgraduate degree in Biometrics from National Institute of Technology, Rourkela, India.

tab_details.Research Interests: Machine Learning, Swarm Intelligence

name: Santosh Kumar Pani
bio: Santosh Kumar Pani is currently working as Professor in the School of Computer Engineering. He has over two decades of experience in teaching, research and administration in KIIT Deemed to be University. He has taught various core courses in Computer Science to the students of Under Graduate and Post Graduate Programmes. He has over twenty research publications indexed in global reputed databases and guided several Ph.D. Scholars and M.Tech students in School of Computer Engineering. He has served in various key administrative positions such as Controller of Examinations of KIIT, Deemed to be University over a period of four years. He has been actively involved in the design of the examination process in SAP implementation of KIIT, Deemed to be University. Under his leadership, KIIT Deemed to be University successfully conducted the online examinations as one of the first institute in the country for all the courses during the CORONA Pandemic situation. His recent research interests include program slicing, data flow analysis, internet of things and cloud services.

tab_details.Research Interests: Data flow analysis, Program Slicing, Internet of Things

name: Santosh Kumar Swain
bio: Santosh Kumar Swain , has completed MCA from Jorhat Engineering College, Dibrugarha University, ASSAM and M. Tech (CS) degree from Utkal University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He has received his Ph. D. at the School of Computer Engineering at KIIT University, India. He is presently working as Professor, School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha. His academic interests lie in Software Engineering, Web Engineering, Compiler Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Cloud Computing and Wireless Sensor Network. Dr. Swain is also author of three books on Computer Science i.e. Computer Fundamentals and C Programming ,  Design and Analysis of Algorithm and Theory of Computations and Applications. Two patents are there in his credit. He has published reseach papers in 50 reputed international journals, 15 international and the book chapters. conferences. He has successfully guided three Ph. D. scholars. Now he is guiding four Ph. D. scholars. He is a member of LMISTE and LMISC.

name: Sarita Mishra
bio: Pursued Bachelor's degree from College of Engineering & Technology, Bhubaneswar. Worked as an Associate Software Engineer at Accenture for around 2 years. Pursued Master's degree from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar. Currently pursuing Ph.D from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar. Research area Machine learning and deep learning.

tab_details.Research Interests: Research area Machine learning and deep learning

name: Sarita Tripathy
bio: Dr. Sarita Tripathy is currently working as an Assistant Professor in School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Odisha. She has completed her B.tech from National Institute of Science and Technology Bhubaneswar,M.Tech from College of Engineering and Technology(Govt. College) Bhubaneswar and Ph.D. from KIIT Deemed to be University. She has more than 16 years of teaching experience. Her favourite teaching subjects include Object Oriented Programming,Data Analytics,Machine learning,Big data,Operating System,DBMS,Cloud Computing,Soft Computing,Mobile Computing and Cyber Security. Her area of research includes Data Analytics, Data security ,Data mining and Data-warehousing,Machine learning,Soft computing.She has published many research papers in national and international conferences and journals,filed patents related to these areas. She guides undergraduate and post graduate students in different project. She has also published many book chapters in different reputed books.She is involved in different academic activities, reviewers in international journals ,different accreditation activities. She has attended more than thirty different programs such as a faculty development program, seminar and workshop in national and international level.She is the life member of CSI, Indian Science Congress,and IET.

tab_details.Research Interests: Data Mining and Data Analytics

name: Satarupa Mohanty
bio: Dr. Satarupa Mohanty is currently working as an Associate Professor, in School of Computer Engineering, KIIT University, Bhubaneswar. She received B.Tech, M.Tech, and PhD degrees in Computer Engineering from KIIT University, in 2002, 2006 and 2017 respectively. Her research area includes: Algorithm Analysis, Parallel Computing, Machine Learning and Bioinformatics. She has edited series of books in her credit.

name: Satyananda Champati Rai
bio: Dr. Satyananda Champati Rai is currently working as an Associate Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar. He completed his M. Tech. and Ph.D. degrees from the School of Mathematics, Statistics and Computer Science, Utkal University, Bhubaneswar in 2001, and 2012, respectively. He has more than 22 years of teaching and research experience. He has published more than 40 research articles in reputed Journals and Conferences. He has written two books and four book chapters. He is a member of ACM, IEEE and a life member of the Orissa Information Technology Society (OITS), ISTE, and the Indian Association for Medical Informatics (IAMI). He has served in several positions in different international conferences - NCEPES-2010, NCICT-2011, WICT-2012, IACT-2013, ICIT-2014, PIC-2016, ICMI-2016, PIC-2017, ICIT-2017, OCIT-2021, and CCPIS-2023. He has supervised 4 Ph.D. scholars, one has submitted the thesis, and three are pursuing; 28 Masters' Dissertations in different areas of - Mobile Ad hoc Networks, Wireless Sensor Networks, and Cloud Computing. His research interests include the application of AI/ML in IoT for general people.

tab_details.Research Interests: Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Health Informatics, Internet of Things and Cloud Computing

name: Saurabh Bilgaiyan
bio: Dr. Saurabh Bilgaiyan holds a distinguished position as a faculty member in the School of Computer Engineering at KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. With a strong passion for both teaching and research, he brings extensive expertise and academic experience to the university’s vibrant learning ecosystem. He earned his Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering from KIIT, Deemed to be University in 2018. He holds a Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering from the same institution (2014) and a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) from BIRT, under Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya (RGPV), Bhopal (2012). Dr. Bilgaiyan is actively engaged in cutting-edge research and has published extensively in reputed peer-reviewed journals, edited volumes, and conference proceedings. His scholarly contributions have garnered significant recognition in the academic community. He is currently supervising M.Tech and Ph.D. scholars in emerging areas of computer science. He also serves as a reviewer for various prestigious international journals and conferences, further demonstrating his expertise and commitment to academic excellence.
books: Expert Committee Member: National Innovation & Startup Policy (NISP), MHRD's Innovation Cell, AICTE — Representing KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India actively contributing to national-level policy formulation and innovation ecosystem development.

Member, Centre of Innovation & Research in Electric Vehicles (CIREV): Collaborating on interdisciplinary research and innovation in electric vehicle technologies under the CIREV initiative at  KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India .

Faculty Coordinator – IT & Web Society: Mentoring students and coordinating co-curricular activities in IT and web development to promote technical and creative skills at KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India

Faculty In-Charge – Industry & Institute Collaboration: Facilitating partnerships with industry to enhance academic-industry synergy, internships, expert talks, and collaborative research at School of Computer Engineering,  KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.
Superintendent – Boys Hostel: Managing administrative and student welfare responsibilities in one of the university's residential facilities.

Former Faculty In-Charge – Research E-Magazine, Website, & Booklet: Led the design, development, and publication of the School’s research e-magazine, official website, and institutional booklet to showcase academic and research achievements.

Former Faculty In-Charge – R&D, Funded Projects, and Consultancy: Led efforts to promote research culture, manage funded projects, and facilitate industry consultancy engagements for the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubneswar, India

He has 5 patents published under his name with various SCI and Scopus indexed research papers, Book chapters, and Conference publications. His area of research interest is fuzzy logic, machine learning, and deep learning.

name: Shaswati Patra
bio:
She completed her Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from BPUT, Odisha. She has qualified both GATE and UGC-NET in Computer Science and Engineering. She obtained her Master's degree in Software Engineering from NIT Durgapur and earned her Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Bhilai.
Her research interests include Parallel Algorithms, Distributed Algorithms, Approximation Algorithms, and Distributed Systems. She has been serving as an Assistant Professor at KIIT since 2015. Over the years, she has taught several under gradute courses such as Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Organization and Architecture, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Information Theory and Coding, Distributed Algorithms, and Distributed Operating Systems. At the postgraduate level, she has taught Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms.

tab_details.Research Interests: DATA STRUCTURE, ALGORITMS, COMPUTER ORGANIZATION AND ARCHITECTURE

name: Siddharth Swarup Rautaray
bio: Siddharth Swarup Rautaray is presently working as an Associate Professor at the School of Computer Engineering, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar Odisha, India. He has teaching and research experience of more than 9+ years. He did his doctoral degree under MHRD scholarship from the Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad, U.P., India. His research interest includes Big Data Analytics, Image Processing, Intelligent Systems, Human-Computer Interaction, and similar innovative areas. His research contribution includes 08+ co-edited proceedings/books which include ASIC Springer series, more than 105+ research publications in reputed conferences, book chapters, and journals indexed in Scopus/SCI/ESCI and with a citation index of more than 2800+. As faculty in charge (FIC) Quality Assurance Cell he has been involved in different National & International Accreditations. As an organizing chair, he has organized 05+ International conferences (ICCAN2017, ICCAN 2019, 16th ICDCIT 2020, FICTA 2016, FICTA 2017) and has been part of different core committees of other conferences and workshops. He has received “Best Researcher Award-2020” at 2nd International Research Awards on Science, Health and Engineering 2020, SHEN, International Research Awards, and “Young Scientist Award-2020” from VDGOOD Professional Association. He has been a member of different advisory boards and Ph.D. examiner to different Universities in India. He has delivered invited talks in different workshops and conferences.

name: Soumya Ranjan Mishra
bio: Dr. Soumya Ranjan Mishra is presently working as an Assistant Professor (II) at the School of Computer Engineering, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (Deemed to be University), Bhubaneswar Odisha, India. He has teaching and research experience of more than 10+ years and Industry experience of 2+ years in IT Companies. He did his doctoral degree Ph.D. in the field of Computer vision and machine learning from the National Institute of Technology, (NIT) Durgapur, WB, India. His research interest includes Image Processing, Intelligent Systems, Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Vision and similar innovative areas. His research contribution includes various proceedings/books which include ASIC Springer series, and publications in reputed conferences, book chapters, and journals indexed in SCI/ESCI.

name: Soumya Ranjan Nayak
bio: Dr. Soumya Ranjan Nayak is currently working as Senior Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, Kalinga Institute of Industrial technology (KIIT) Deemed to be University, Odisha. He received his Ph.D and M.Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering under MHRD Govt. of India fellowship from CET, BPUT Rourkela, India; with a preceded degree of B. Tech and Diploma in Computer Science and Engineering. He has published more than 100 articles in peer-reviewed journals and conferences of international repute like Elsevier, Springer, World Scientific, IOS Press, Taylor & Francis, Hindawi, Inderscience, IGI Global, etc.. Apart from that, 16 Book Chapter, 6 Books and 7 Indian patents (4 patents granted) and two International patents (two patents granted) under his credit. His current research interests include medical image analysis and classification, machine learning, deep learning, pattern recognition, fractal graphics and computer vision. Dr. Nayak serves as an associate editor of Journal of Electronic Imaging (SPIE), Mathematical Problems in Engineering (Hindawi), Journal of Biomedical if Imaging (Hindawi), Applied Computational Intelligence and Soft Computing (Hindawi), and PLOS One. He is also serving as Guest editor for special issues of the journal like Springer Nature, Elsevier, and Taylor & Franchise. He has associated as reviewer of many peer-reviewed reputed journals such as Applied Mathematics and Computation, Journal of Applied Remote Sensing, Mathematical Problems in Engineering, International Journal of Light and Electron optics, Journal of Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems, Future Generation Computer Systems, Pattern Recognition Letters, etc. He has also served as Technical Program Committee Member of several conferences of international repute.

name: Sourabh Debnath
bio: Mr. Sourabh Debnath is currently serving as an Assistant Professor (I) in the School of Computer Engineering at KIIT University. He completed his B.Tech from Government College of Engineering Kalahandi (GCEK), Bhawanipatna in 2016 and pursued his M.Tech from Veer Surendra Sai University of Technology (VSSUT), Burla and completed in 2018. He has academic experience as an Assistant Professor at GIETU Guntur for six months and at NIST University, Berhampur for one year. He joined his Ph.D. program at NIT Rourkela in January 2020 and has successfully submitted his Ph.D. thesis. His research interests include coverless steganography, cybersecurity, Image and Videoprocessing, Information hiding, and machine learning.

name: Sovan Kumar Sahoo
bio: Sovan Kumar Sahoo is an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Bhubaneshwar. He is pursuing Ph.D. from the Department of Computer Science & Engineering, IIT Patna. He has spent the last seven years conducting research in Natural Language Processing, Information Extraction, Knowledge Graphs, Question Answering, and Deep Learning. He was a member of the AI-NLP-ML lab at IIT Patna, where he worked on several sponsored research projects funded by private companies such as LG and Wipro, as well as government agencies such as MeiTY, Government of India, and MoE, Government of India, under the guidance of Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya and Dr. Asif Ekbal. He received his MTech from the Department of Information Technology, IIEST Shibpur, and his BTech from the College of Engineering and Management, Kolaghat. Previously, he worked as a Performance Test Engineer at Cognizant. He has served several journals, including Sādhanā, SN Computer Science, PLOS One, ACM TALLIP, Expert Systems With Applications, Neural Networks, Computer Speech & Language, and Conferences like ACL, ICON, and ICONIP, as a reviewer. He also served as a PC member at conferences such as ICONIP and ICON.

tab_details.Research Interests: Natural Language Processing, Information Extraction, Knowledge Graphs, Question Answering, ChatBot and Deep Learning

name: Sricheta Parui
bio: Sricheta Parui recently submitted her Ph.D. thesis in Computer Science and Engineering at the esteemed Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur (IIT-KGP), where her groundbreaking research focused on harnessing Artificial Intelligence for Non-Invasive Brain Signals Processing and Psychophysiological Characteristics Assessment. Sricheta's academic journey is marked by excellence. She earned her Master's degree in Control System Engineering from Jadavpur University, Kolkata, in 2018, and her Bachelor's in Instrumentation and Control Engineering from Calcutta Institute of Engineering and Management (CIEM) in 2016, where she was honored with a Gold medal for achieving the university's top position. Sricheta's research interests are diverse, spanning Cognitive Science, Brain-Machine Interface, Emotional Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. Her passion for cutting-edge research has been recognized with the UGC Post Graduate Indira Gandhi Single Girl Child Scholarship (2016-2018) during her master's studies. Sricheta's academic prowess has garnered numerous awards and fellowships, including the prestigious IEEE Computer Society Richard E. Merwin Student Fellowship '22, IEEE Lance Stafford Larson Student award '21, Google Student Scholarship '21, and Young Scientist Conference Awardee '20. Sricheta's research contributions are well documented through numerous papers published in renowned IEEE flagship conferences and journals. Her impactful work has earned her various prestigious Best Paper and Presentation awards, highlighting her commitment to advancing knowledge in her field. Sricheta has received various travel grants and fellowships to attend conferences where she has presented her work. These opportunities underscore her commitment to academic excellence and the dissemination of impactful research. Her commitment to excellence extends to various IEEE roles, earning her distinctions such as IEEE Brand Ambassador, IEEE STEM Champion 2022, IEEE Ethics Champion 2023, IEEE VOLT Graduate 2024, IEEE Xtreme 15.0 Ambassador, IEEE Day Ambassador, and IEEE CS GSC Outreach Ambassador. Actively contributing to the academic community, Sricheta serves as the Secretary of IEEE Student Branch Kharagpur Section and holds leadership roles as the Vice Chair of the IEEE Computer Society Student Branch Chapter at IIT Kharagpur. Additionally, she serves as the Vice Chair and Assistant Treasurer of IEEE Women in Engineering, IEEE Kharagpur Section. Her multifaceted involvement reflects a dedication to fostering excellence and diversity within the field.

name: Subhadip Pramanik
bio: Dr. Subhadip Pramanik is presently working as an Assistant Professor (II) at the School of Computer Engineering, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (Deemed to be University), Bhubaneswar Odisha, India. He accomplished his Ph.D. in the field of Data Science & AI from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur, India in 2023. He received his M.Tech. in Computer Science & Data Processing from the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Kharagpur, India, in 2018. Prior to that he received his M.Sc. in Applied Mathematics and Computer Programming from Vidyasagar University, West Bengal, India in 2016. His research interests focus on Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Nature-Inspired Algorithms, Data-Driven Evolutionary Optimization, and Data Mining.

name: Subhasis Dash
bio: Mr. Subhasis Dash is an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. In the year 2002, he received his B.Tech. (CSE) degree from Utkal University and in 2006 he received his M.Tech. (CSE) degree from KIIT Deemed to be University. He had already submitted his Ph.D. thesis in December 2019 from KIIT Deemed to be University Bhubaneswar. His research areas include wireless sensor networks, distributed computing, and operating systems. Ten numbers of publications are there to his credit in many International journals and proceedings. He is having Seventeen years of experience in teaching undergraduate and postgraduate courses. In addition to this, he is also designated as ULK-1 Master Trainer from WIPRO Technology. Apart from teaching, he is also holding administrative positions in the University like the Sr. Superintendent of Hostel. He is a lifetime member of ISTE and ISCA.

She obtained her Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the National Institute of Technology, Rourkela, in 2025. She completed her M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering from Veer Surendra Sai University of Technology, Burla. Her research interests are in the area of Computer Networks, focusing on Advanced Network Architectures, Congestion Control, Multipath TCP, and Network Performance Optimization.

name: Subhranshu Sekhar Tripathy
bio: Dr. Subhranshu Sekhar Tripathy is currently working as an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Odisha, India. He has obtained his Bachelor's degree from the National Institute of Science and Technology (NIST), Berhampur, Odisha and a Master's degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Bharath Institute of Higher Education and Research, Tamilnadu. He received his Doctoral degree (Ph.D.) from the National Institute of Technology (NIT), Meghalaya, India. He holds around 9+ years of experience teaching undergraduate and post-graduate Computer Science and Engineering students in different engineering colleges. He has published 1 patent, 9 research papers in SCI-indexed journals (IEEE Transactions, Archives of Computational Methods in Engineering), and presented 14 research papers in various international conferences. His research interests include Cloud Computing, Fog Computing, IoT, and Smart cities and Smart healthcare.

name: Suchismita Rout
bio:
"Dr. Suchismita Rout currently working as an Associate Professor in School of Computer Engineering in KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, which is regarded as one of the leading International universities in the area of academic and research in India. She has always been a vibrant lady in the field of Research and Development. She obtained her PhD degree in the field of Computer Science and Engineering from School of Computer engineering, KIIT DU. Her Masters is in the field of Computer Science and Engineering from National Institute of Technology, Rourkela, Odisha.  During the period of her masters, she had experience of JRF for a DST sponsored project in NIT, Rourkela. Her research interests include Software Defined Networking, Mobile Ad Hoc Network, Wireless Sensor Network, Cloud Computing. She has authored highly cited articles in reputed International Journals, Conferences and book chapters. She has successfully organized many faculty developments programme, invited talks, student seminars and bridge courses. Along with that, she has delivered technical talks as a resource person in different organizations. She is a member of the Editorial board and Review Committee for International Conferences and Journals. She is a Fellow of ACEEE, ISTE, IEEE.
 She has engaged in academic activities for the last 18 years. She has been an active supporter of experimental learning for students and has conceptualized Integration of Industry Oriented courses into the curriculum. She is a WIPRO Certified Faculty for providing training in the field of JAVA and J2EEE from August 2020. She has earlier served in various positions in different premier institutes, namely Silicon Institute of Technology, Bhubaneswar and PCE, Rourkela. She has industry experience in Accenture, Bangalore. She has been associated with a broad spectrum of subjects in teaching and is equally proficient in contributing to society through her innovative research work. Her intellectual vigor along with the personal warmth makes her one of the most sought after teachers. She received the Best Teacher Award on the eve of Engineer’s Day 2022 in Odisha Technological Conclave organized by Ever Green Forum on 15th September 2022 at Jayadev Bhawan, Bhubaneswar. In addition to this, she is not only engaged in the teaching and research profession, but also in other fields to showcase her talent and give a platform to others to do the same. 
"

name: Suman Majumder
bio: Name & Profession: Dr. Suman Majumder – Researcher, Academic, and Technology Professional. Academic Background: Post-Doctorate at Nanyang Technological University (N.T.U), Singapore (focused on Cross-Blockchain and Quantum-Blockchain applications). Ph.D. in Computer Science Engineering from N.I.T Sikkim (Secure communication protocols for IoT and blockchain-based e-voting). M.Tech in Information Technology from Jadavpur University;  B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering from West Bengal University of Technology. Notable Accomplishments: Working as a "Visiting cum Collaborative Researcher" with the National University of Singapore (N.U.S), mainly in the domain of "Quantum Hardware". Received “Certificate of Achievement” from IBM India and PMI (Phillip Morris International, a Client of IBM) on 20.09.13 for outstanding team performance and collaboration. Worked on challenging live projects for several European Countries, like PMI (Philip Morris International) from 30.07.2012 to 01.10.2014, BIO RAD Industries from 30.04.2012 to 29.07.2012, and British American Tobacco (BAT) from 18.10.2011 to 29.04.2012. Delivered lectures on IoT Security during a one-week Cyber Security workshop organized by NIT Arunachal Pradesh, sponsored by ATAL Academy, Delhi & TEQIP-III (3rd–7th February 2020) and received a "Participation cum Appreciation Certificate" from N.I.T Arunachal Pradesh. Honoured and active as a Track Chair and Reviewer for international conferences ICNSBT 2025 and ISAI 2025. Presented a lecture on a complex topic in Quantum Computing (available on YouTube: https://youtu.be/sQ3RyiElOs0). Before joining KIIT, he was an Assistant Professor II at the Computer Science Engineering Department, Amity University. Authored numerous high-indexed SCI journals, research articles, book chapters, and international conference papers.

She has seven international patents to her credit.

bio: Dr. Sunil Kumar Goud received the Ph.D degree  National Institute of Technology Jamshedpur, Odisha, India, the M.Tech degree in Computer Science from the the National Institute of Technology Rourkela, Odisha, India in 2012,  bachelor’s degree(B.Tech) in computer science and engineering from the College of Engineering and Technology, Odisha, India in 2008.  He is having more than 13 years of experience in teaching & academics and more than 6 years of experience in research . He is currently an Assistant Professor with the school of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, INDIA.  He has authored and co-authored many reasearch articles of national and international repute.

name: Sushruta Mishra
bio:
Sushruta Mishra is presently working as Assistant Professor in School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He received his B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from ITER, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He received his M.Tech degree in Computer Science & Engineering from IIIT, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He received his Ph.D in Computer Science & Engineering from KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. His research area of interest includes Data Science, Machine Learning, Sentiment Analysis, Internet of Things and Cognitive Computing. He has published more than 50 research articles in reputed international journals, Edited books and conferences. He is the life member of CSI and IAENG. 
Dr. Sushruta Mishra,actively involved in multiple research activities. Machine learning, Dimensionality reduction, Cognitive computing and Internet of Things are his core research areas of interest. He has published more than 130 research articles including journal papers, conference articles, book chapters and edited books in different reputed publications. He is the organizing Chair of an inyternational conference on Advancements in Smart, Secure and Intelligent Computing (ASSIC), IEEE. Currently he has a google scholar h-index of 25. Also at present, he is the main supervisor of a US based R&D consultancy project "Automated Data Labeling and Modelling".

name: Swagat Ranjan Sahoo
bio: Dr. Swagat Ranjan Sahoo is currently serving as an Assistant Professor (II) in the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Odisha. He completed his Ph.D. from IIT Guwahati in 2025, M.Tech from NIT Allahabad in 2012, and B.Tech from BPUT, Odisha in 2010. He has over six years of teaching experience and three years of industry experience. His favourite teaching subjects include Cloud Computing, Computer Networks, Operating Systems, Web Technology, and Real-Time Systems. His research interests span Vehicular Ad hoc Networks (VANETs), Cloud Computing, and Artificial Intelligence. Dr. Sahoo has published more than 10 research papers in reputed national and international conferences and journals. He actively guides undergraduate and postgraduate students in academic and research projects. He has one published patent and three patents filed with the Indian Patent Office. He has taken on several leadership roles as part of organizing committees for international conferences, workshops, and FDPs. He has also served as a TPC member and Session Chair for various international conferences, and worked as a reviewer for international journals and conferences. He has qualified GATE twice and also cleared the NIC recruitment test.

name: Swagatika Sahoo
bio: Now I am Assistant Professor [I] at KIIT University and pursuing Ph.D. at IIT Patna under the supervision of Dr. Raju Halder. My research focuses on using blockchain technology to build secure and robust applications while leveraging the potential of language tools and associated technologies. Additionally, I enjoy investigating and resolving problems pertaining to language tools and cryptography.

name: Tanik Saikh
bio:
Tanik Saikh is an Assistant Professor in Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT) university, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. Prior to joining KIIT, he was a postdoctoral researcher at L3S Research Center, Leibniz University, Hannover, Germany. He did his Ph.D. in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, at IIT Patna. He was fortunate to be advised by Dr. Asif Ekbal and Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya. Generally, his research interest lies in the domain of Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL), particularly in applying Natural Language Inference (NLI)/ Textual Entailment (TE) in Fake News Detection, Question Answering, and Novelty Detection. Currently, he is working on multi-modal (combining text with image) fake news detection in the news domain, multi-modal question answering, i.e., reasoning over multiple modalities (text, images, table) to extract the best possible answer to a complex question. Prior to joining IIT Patna, he was involved as Research Engineer at Jadavpur University. He has more than ten years of working experience in the different areas of NLP, Text Analytics, and Machine Learning. He worked in several national level consortia based projects funded by DeitY, Govt. of India, in Computer Science and Engineering Department, Jadavpur University, and also continued research work in Textual Entailment, Question Answering, Machine Learning, Eye Tracking, etc. During his stay at Jadavpur University he did an one year certification course on Introduction to Linguistics. He did his masters (M.Tech) and bachelor (B.Tech) from Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology Shibpur, and Government College of Engineering and Leather Technology, West Bengal University of Technology, West Bengal, India. He did hid schooling from his native place located at Birbhum district in West Bengal. He also worked as a lecturer in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering department, Aliah University, Kolkata, India for more than a year. 
Google Scholar Citation which is the benchmark for Computer Science and Engineering shows 206 career citations to my papers. My h-index: 8 and i-10 index: 6.

name: Tanmoy Maitra
bio: Presently, Dr. Tanmoy Maitra is an Assistant Professor, School of Computer Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar-751024, Odisha, India. In 2020, he did his Ph.D. from the Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Jadavpur University, Kolkata-700032, India. He passed M.Tech. and B.E. from Haldia Institute of Technology (WBUT) in 2013 and University Institute of Technology (Burdwan University) in 2009 respectively. He qualified GATE 2011 and GATE 2012. He did his schooling from Bethuadahari J.C.M High School. He has published several book chapters, and journal and conference articles in the domain of wireless sensor networks (WSNs), body area network (BAN) and authentication system for several applications. He is also a reviewer of many reputed journals. He served as a TPC member of several conferences. He was the Organizing and Finance Chair of ICMC 2019. His research interest includes Wireless Sensor Networks, Body Area Network, and Information Security. He is the member of the IEEE.

bio: Gautami is presently working as an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Engineering, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (Deemed to be University), Bhubaneswar Odisha, India. She has teaching and research experience of 6 years. She is Pursuing doctoral degree Ph.D. in the field of Wireless Body Sensor Networks from the National Institute of Technology, (NIT) Rourkela, Orissa, India. Her research interest includes Internet of Things, Body Area Network's, Sensor Networks, Network Communications. Her research contribution includes various proceedings/books which include ASIC Springer series, and publications in reputed conferences, book chapters, and journals indexed in SCI/ESCI.

name: Vikas Hassija 2
bio: Dr. vikas Hassija (Postdoc, National University of Singapore) is an active researcher in the areas of healthcare, Blockchain, IoT, and NFTs. He has multiple publications with various renowned researchers around the globe. He has closely worked with Prof. Biplab Sikdar as a postdoc fellow in National University of Singapore. He has done his Ph.D. from Jaypee institute of information technology, Noida and Masters from BITS-Pilani, Pilani campus, India. He has more than 2000 google scholar citations and more than 45 publications in high impact journals and conferences. He has various healthcare related publications with Prof. Sherally Zedaly from University of Kentucky, USA. He has also collaborated with various other researchers working in this domain, such as Prof. Mohsen Guizani, (Fellow, IEEE; Qatar University), and Prof. Joel Rodrigues (Fellow, IEEE; Federal University of Piauí, Brazil) which has helped him develop a strong research foundation and impact in these areas.

name: Mainak Biswas 2
bio: Dr Mainak Biswas, PhD, computer scientist with specialization in application of machine learning and deep learning in biomedical domain. His research is inspired from providing an effective solution for computer aided diagnosis for diverse diseases. His PhD specialization was in application of advanced machine learning and deep learning in complex tissue characterization and segmentation from ultrasound images of liver and carotid arteries. His other interests are development of advanced machine learning architectures and early warning systems for risk estimation of both symptomatic and asymptomatic patients at high risk of CVDs. He also has keen interest in development of new metrics for Machine Learning algorithms based on statistical mechanics. He has published and presented more than 30 papers in the area of characterization and segmentation of ultrasound images through machine and deep learning platforms. His H-index is 16, and he has more than 1700 citations on his research. One of his review paper “The Present and Future of Deep Learning in Radiology” has more than 300 citations. Dr. Mainak Biswas completed B.Tech from Government College of Engineering and Ceramic Technology under West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata, M.Tech from Jadavpur University and PhD from National Institute of Technology Goa, INDIA. Currently, he is serving as Associate Professor at Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology.

tab_details.Research Interests: Machine Learning and Deep Learning

name: Meghna G Raj
bio: Dr. Meghana G Raj is a distinguished academician with a robust educational background and extensive teaching and research experience in the field of Computer Science and Engineering. She earned her  Master’s degree from the prestigious National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal, India and completed her Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering at KiiT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneshwar, specializing in cutting-edge research areas. With over nine years of teaching experience, Dr. Meghana has guided and inspired undergraduate students in a wide array of subjects, including the Internet of Things (IoT), Database Management Systems, and Algorithm Design and Analysis and Operating Systems. Her teaching approach blends academic rigor with practical insights, equipping students with a comprehensive understanding of foundational and emerging technologies. Before transitioning to academia, Dr. Meghana gained valuable industry experience during her tenure at IBM India, Bangalore, where she worked for two years. Her professional journey has given her a unique perspective, enabling her to bridge the gap between academic theory and industry practices. Dr. Meghana’s research interests lie in cloud-based security, algorithm design, and the Internet of Things, reflecting her passion for addressing real-world challenges through innovative solutions. She has actively contributed to the advancement of knowledge in these areas, demonstrating her commitment to academic excellence and impactful research. A dedicated educator and researcher, Dr. Meghana G Raj continues to inspire her students and peers alike, fostering a culture of learning, innovation, and collaboration.

name: Hrudaya Kumar Tripathy
bio: Dr. HRUDAYA KUMAR TRIPATHY is a Professor of the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT, Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. He has completed a Doctorate in Computer Science from Berhampur University, Master in Computer Science and Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati and a Post Doctoral Fellowship from the Ministry of Higher Education, Malaysia. Dr. Tripathy has 24 years of teaching experience with post-doctorate research experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence, Soft Computing, Machine Learning, Speech Processing, Mobile Robotics, and Data Analytics. He had been a visiting faculty for a couple of years in Asia Pacific University, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and the Universiti of Utara Malaysia, Sintok, Malaysia. Dr. Tripathy was awarded a Young IT Professional Award in 2013 on a regional level by the Computer Society of India (CSI). Awarded as best visiting faculty by UUM, Malaysia in the year 2016, listed as the world’s top 2% scientists in the year 2023 by Stanford. He is a senior member of the IEEE Society, a life member of CSI & has membership in other professional bodies such as IET, IACSIT, and IAENG. Dr. Tripathy is the editor of 11 books under the publication houses of Springer, Elsevier, Wiley, and IGI Global. He has published more than 150 research publications in different national/international journals and conferences.

She has received her B.Tech. in 2011 from BPUT and M.Tech. in 2013 in Computer Science & Engineering from ITER, S'O'A University. name: Suresh Chandra Satapathy
bio: Dr Suresh Chandra Satapathy is a Ph.D in Computer Science Engineering, currently working as Professor of School of Computer Engg and Dean- Research at KIIT (Deemed to be University), Bhubaneshwar, Odisha, India. He held the position of the National Chairman  (Educational and Research) of Computer Society of India and is also  a senior Member of IEEE. He has been instrumental in organizing more than 60 International Conferences in India as Organizing Chair and edited more than 80  Book Volumes from Springer LNCS, AISC, LNEE and SIST Series as Corresponding Editor. He is quite active in research in the areas of Swarm Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Mining and Cognitive Sciences. He has developed two new optimization algorithms known as Social Group Optimization (SGO) published in Springer Journal and SELO( Social Evolution and Learning Algorithm)  published in Elsevier. He has delivered number of Keynote addresses and Tutorials in his areas of expertise in various events in India and abroad. He has more than 150  publications in reputed journals and conf proceedings. Dr. Suresh is in Editorial board of IGI Global, Inderscience, Growing Science journals and also Guest Editor for Arabian Journal of Science and Engg published by Springer. He is the Editor-in-Chief of IJIDSS from Inderscience and Associate Editor of KES Journal from IOS press.He is a visiting professor to number of reputed Universities like University of Leicester , London, NTU, Singapore, Duy Tan University, Vietnam, etc. He was awarded Leadership in Academia Award in India  by ASSOCHEM for the year 2017.

tab_details.Research Interests: Swarm Intelligence, Machine Learning
